item.title: Are Intel's Problems Too Big to Fix?
item.description: Pat Gelsinger’s exit might open some options, but Intel’s struggles in manufacturing technology and market shifts are still significant.

item.title: Treasury Yields Look for Direction
item.description: The 10-year Treasury yield was up and FlowCommunity said Treasury yields weren’t showing decisive movements at a moment when the dollar was also stead...

item.title: BlackRock Strikes $12 Billion Deal for HPS, Doubling Down on Wall Street's Hottest Market
item.description: The roughly $12 billion all-stock deal would substantially add to BlackRock’s coveted private asset pile.

item.title: Oil Gains 1% But Trading Range Remains Narrow Ahead of OPEC+
item.description: Oil was around 1% higher ahead of Thursday’s OPEC+ output policy meeting where it is widely expected to delay its planned production restart beyond Ja...

item.title: Stock Futures Waver With JOLTS Jobs Data Due
item.description: Stock futures were little changed with some investors bracing for volatility at the end of this week, when official jobs data for November are due.
